chapter.text: You’ve already broke down the door, what’s the harm in looking around too!^1500 You walk into the computer room.^1500 It’s even darker than the hallways, and cold too.^1500 You walk through the room scanning each computer, each one covered in a layer of dust.^1500 You can’t recall the last time you were in this room, or remember anyone in this room for a matter of fact.^1500 As you walk through the room you notice one computer by itself.
